data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Degree One burns are minor and can be cured at home. They ____ leave ____. A ____ can ____ them ____ hot ____, a minor ____, ____ by ____ hot ____. It causes pain, but only the top layer of skin is burnt and no nerves are injured.
data.partBlankContent: Degree One burns are minor and can be cured at home. They sel___ leave sc___. A per___ can g__ them fr__ hot wa___, a minor sun____, o_ by touc____ hot me___. It causes pain, but only the top layer of skin is burnt and no nerves are injured.
data.answer: 一级烧伤是轻微的，可以在家里治愈。他们很少留下伤疤。一个人可以通过热水，轻微的晒伤，或触摸热金属得到它们。它会引起疼痛，但只会灼伤皮肤表层，不会损伤神经。
